title: Avast
description: Avast's brand palette features a vibrant mix of colors that reflect their innovative and trusted presence in the cybersecurity industry. The colors range from the bold primary 'Orange' (#FF7800) linking to Avast's energetic and approachable character, to deep 'Violet' shades (#6534AC, #261C6A) symbolizing innovation and security. The ‘White’ (#FFFFFF) and ‘Black’ (#000000) provide balance and professionalism, ensuring the brand appears modern and reliable. This colorful representation is derived from Avon and brand guidelines as evidenced in their 2019 press materials.
